title: Reason for people in Southeast Asian countries

content.question: According to the article, what is the specific reason that some young people in some Southeast Asian countries wish to study Chinese?

choices.label: They want to communicate with movie stars.
They want to become Chinese teachers.
They want to earn a scholarship to study abroad.

content.answer: They want to communicate with movie stars.

unit.text: 2: The Influence of Language and Culture on Identity

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Make connections among cultural and interdisciplinary information provided in texts.
